item.title: Arch Linux install on Huawei MateBook Pro X 2019
item.description: Table of contents Installation Update BIOS if possible Create an Arch Boot USB Key Boot from USB Make Fonts Readable Connect to internet Partition and Format Setup Disk Encryption Basic Configuration Make the system bootable Post Install Configuration Connect to internet Create a regular user Setup power saving Get X11 Working Other useful app Setup my dot files Install a AUR Helper Automatic startx at user login Make Pacman faster Various configurations Setup the Linux Console font for HiDPi Setup user dirs Configure the Trackpad Hibernate on Low Battery Time Sync Fixes 4.
